div.div: We support projects that aim to provide the resources and areas that are related to hygiene and educate the children about its importance. Ideally a shelter should provide a bathroom with shower, sink and toilet that must be clean at any time, a place to clean cloths and it is essential that all areas are clean including mattresses, rooms and kitchen. As an educational exercise we should encourage children to participate in daily cleaning tasks. This mustnâ€™t me done as a way to reduce expenses for cleaning purposes but as good parents do with their own children to teach them the sense of responsibility and community.
